query:
-- Primeiro, limpar registros órfãos
DELETE FROM student_topic_progress WHERE topicId NOT IN (SELECT id FROM learning_topics);

-- Agora atualizar 4 tópicos da disciplina SEC para em progresso
UPDATE student_topic_progress 
SET status = 'in_progress' 
WHERE studentId = 60063 
AND topicId IN (420005, 420006, 420007, 420008)
AND status = 'completed';

-- Agora atualizar 4 tópicos da disciplina SEC para em progresso

SET status = 'in_progress' 
WHERE studentId = 60063

AND status = 'completed';
